typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Timber_Sale_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Species_Code as string,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_Export as string,
		Product_Type_Code as string,
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Quantity as string,
		Sales_Revenue as string,
		Production_Cost as string,
		Stumpage as string,
		Unit_Stumpage as string,
		Currency_Code as string,
		Average_Sales_Price as string,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as string,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as string,
		Budget_Production_Cost as string,
		Budget_Stumpage as string,
		Validation_Error as string,
		Product as string,
		Delivery_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as string,
		Sales_Month as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Timber_Sale_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Species_Code as string,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_Export as string,
		Product_Type_Code as string,
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Unit_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Currency_Code as string,
		Average_Sales_Price as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalOpsTimberSales
GenerateStagingChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product_Type_Code = Price_Point_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		StagingChecksum,
		Sales_Month,
		Price_Point = ConvertDateandIDandNumbers@Price_Point,
		Delivery_Point_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectStagingData
SelectNewRecordData derive(insert_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
RelationalOpsTimberSales derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Species_Code,Customer,Domestic_Export,Product_Type_Code,Price_Point_Code,Sales_Unit_Code,Sales_Quantity,Sales_Revenue,Production_Cost,Stumpage,Unit_Stumpage,Currency_Code,Average_Sales_Price,Budget_Sales_Quantity,Budget_Sales_Revenue,Budget_Production_Cost,Budget_Stumpage)) ~> GenerateRelationalChecksum
GenerateRelationalChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Timber_Sale_ID = Timber_Sale_ID,
		Relation_Reporting_Period = Reporting_Period,
		Relation_Species_Code = Species_Code,
		Relation_Customer = Customer,
		Relation_Domestic_Export = Domestic_Export,
		Relation_Product_Type_Code = Product_Type_Code,
		Relation_Price_Point_Code = Price_Point_Code,
		Relation_Sales_Unit_Code = Sales_Unit_Code,
		Relation_Sales_Quantity = Sales_Quantity,
		Relation_Sales_Revenue = Sales_Revenue,
		Relation_Production_Cost = Production_Cost,
		Relation_Stumpage = Stumpage,
		Relation_Unit_Stumpage = Unit_Stumpage,
		Relation_Currency_Code = Currency_Code,
		Relation_Average_Sales_Price = Average_Sales_Price,
		Relation_Budget_Sales_Quantity = Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Relation_Budget_Sales_Revenue = Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Relation_Budget_Production_Cost = Budget_Production_Cost,
		Relation_Budget_Stumpage = Budget_Stumpage,
		Relation_Insert_Datetime = Insert_Datetime,
		Relation_Update_Datetime = Update_Datetime,
		Relation_Process_Name = Process_Name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalData
ConvertDateandIDandNumbers derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Species_Code,Customer,Domestic_Export,Product_Type_Code,Price_Point_Code,Sales_Unit_Code,Sales_Quantity,Sales_Revenue,Production_Cost,Stumpage,Unit_Stumpage,Currency_Code,Average_Sales_Price,Budget_Sales_Quantity,Budget_Sales_Revenue,Budget_Production_Cost,Budget_Stumpage)) ~> GenerateStagingChecksum
SelectStagingData, SelectRelationalData lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID
	&& Timber_Sale_ID == Relation_Timber_Sale_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CompareKeys
AddAuditColumns, SelectChangeRecord union(byName: true)~> UnionNewAndExisting
NewAndExistingTimberSales@NewTimberSales select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product_Type_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Sales_Month,
		Delivery_Point_Code,
		Price_Point
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectNewRecordData
UnionNewAndExisting alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowUpsert
CompareKeys split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum || 
Sales_Quantity != Relation_Sales_Quantity || 
Sales_Revenue != Relation_Sales_Revenue || 
Production_Cost != Relation_Production_Cost || 
Stumpage != Relation_Stumpage || 
Unit_Stumpage != Relation_Unit_Stumpage || 
Average_Sales_Price != Relation_Average_Sales_Price || 
Budget_Sales_Quantity != Relation_Budget_Sales_Quantity || 
Budget_Sales_Revenue != Relation_Budget_Sales_Revenue || 
Budget_Production_Cost != Relation_Budget_Production_Cost || 
Budget_Stumpage != Relation_Budget_Stumpage,
	disjoint: false) ~> NewAndExistingTimberSales@(NewTimberSales, ChangedTimberSales, ExistingNoChange)
NewAndExistingTimberSales@ChangedTimberSales derive(update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> ChangedAddAuditData
ChangedAddAuditData select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID = Relation_Timber_Sale_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product_Type_Code,
		Price_Point,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		insert_datetime = Relation_Insert_Datetime,
		update_datetime,
		process_name,
		Delivery_Point_Code,
		Sales_Month
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectChangeRecord
StagingDB derive(Timber_Sale_ID = toInteger(Timber_Sale_ID),
		Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Sales_Quantity = toDecimal(Sales_Quantity, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Sales_Revenue = toDecimal(Sales_Revenue, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Production_Cost = toDecimal(Production_Cost, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Stumpage = toDecimal(Stumpage, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Unit_Stumpage = toDecimal(Unit_Stumpage, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Average_Sales_Price = toDecimal(Average_Sales_Price, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Budget_Sales_Quantity = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Quantity, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Budget_Sales_Revenue = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Revenue, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Budget_Production_Cost = toDecimal(Budget_Production_Cost, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Budget_Stumpage = toDecimal(Budget_Stumpage, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Sales_Month = toDate(Sales_Month,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Price_Point = toDecimal(Price_Point, 19, 4, "###,###.####")) ~> ConvertDateandIDandNumbers
AlterRowUpsert sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Timber_Sale_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Species_Code as string,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_Export as string,
		Product_Type_Code as string,
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Unit_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Currency_Code as string,
		Average_Sales_Price as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Timber_Sale_ID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product_Type_Code,
		Price_Point_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Insert_Datetime = insert_datetime,
		Update_Datetime = update_datetime,
		Process_Name = process_name
	)) ~> UpserttRow
